name: akamai
label: Akamai Prolexic
description: Akamai is an American content delivery network (CDN), cybersecurity, and cloud service company, providing web and Internet security services.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Akamai server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client Token
fields.name: client_token
fields.description: Client token used to access the Akamai server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: access_token
fields.description: Access token used to access the Akamai server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Client secret of the Akamai server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: List Critical Events
operations.description: Retrieves a critical events list for a customer from Akamai based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Contract Name
parameters.name: contract
parameters.description: The contract is the policy domain name of the data center or proxy that events belong to.

parameters.title: Contract Name

operations.title: List Attack Reports
operations.description: Retrieves a list of attack reports for a customer within the specified time range from Akamai.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Starting datetime from when you want to retrieve attack report.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Ending datetime from when you want to retrieve attack report.

parameters.title: Contract Name
parameters.name: contract
parameters.description: The contract is the policy domain name of the data center or proxy that events belong to.

operations.title: Get An Attack Report
operations.description: Retrieves an attack report for the specified customer and Attack ID from Akamai.

parameters.title: Attack ID
parameters.name: attackId
parameters.tooltip: A unique ID for each attack. e.g. 1966.
parameters.description: A unique ID for each attack that you want to retrieve from Akamai.
